body:
Checked the leaderboards and saw on a new format (not rly liking it and i prefer the old one) and noticed my weekly stats for DTM today are not even there...

Can someone tell me what happened or is it like an update, ik the ldbd reset for weeklys and monthlys but i definitely know i got more mons and wools today than it says on it rn...

title: Leaderboards Updated?

replies.body: This here is probably a bug due to the various website updates that have recently been going on, I recommend reporting this on the github @ https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues.
